main event: A witness observed a flying saucer coming toward him in San Gabriel, California at night.
interesting points: The object was described as round or oval in shape and illuminated, emitting a brilliant white-blue light., The witness reported the object maneuvering rather than floating, which exceeded the performance of any aircraft he had seen before., The sighting lasted for an estimated 2 hours, from about 7:30 PM to 8:00 PM., The object was seen at an altitude of about 600-800 feet., The witness speculated the object could be a new type of US military or experimental aircraft.
sighted object: a flying saucer emitting a brilliant white-blue light
witness description: a 52-year-old maintenance man for a laundromat with a background in electricity and accountancy
